exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverLayerSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="txt_final_score" text="" x="0" y="533" width="640" size="50" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" />
	<e:Button id="btn_restart"  width="120" height="120" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-95" enabled="true">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="80%" height.down="80%" source="restart_png" source.down="restart_png" source.disabled="restart_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GamingLayerSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="txt_speed" text="" x="0" y="0" textAlign="left" bold="true" fontFamily="SimSun" anchorOffsetX="0" width="136.12" anchorOffsetY="0" height="31.52" size="40"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_score" text="" y="0" fontFamily="SimSun" anchorOffsetX="0" width="118.67" right="0" textAlign="right" size="40" textColor="0x00ff00"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_ready" text=""  size="100" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"  x="3.5" y="518" anchorOffsetX="0" width="633" visible="false"/>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="StartGameLayerSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="btn_start"  width="120" height="120" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-60" enabled="true">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="80%" height.down="80%" source="start_png" source.down="start_png" source.disabled="start_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
    <e:Button id="btn_rank"  width="120" height="120" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="60" enabled="true">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="80%" height.down="80%" source="rank_png" source.down="rank_png" source.disabled="rank_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>
